amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.catchline: Public Guardian; limitation on appointment; notice.
amendatorysection.para: The Public Guardian may accept an appointment as a guardian or conservator for an individual not to exceed an average of forty individuals per associate public guardian hired by the office. When the average has been reached, the Public Guardian shall not accept further appointments. The Public Guardian, upon reaching the maximum number of appointments, shall notify the State Court Administrator that the maximum number of appointments has been reached.
